info.name: Trello - Digital Dark
info.description:
Turns Trello into a low-light compatible website that is also easy on the eyes.

Actual License: GPL-2.0 (OSS)

Source Code | Issue Tracker
info.additionalInfo:
2019-04-25 (Thanks to matealex)
  • Fixed background.
  • Fixed comment area background.
2018-06-26
  • Fixed shadow on list entries (Thanks GladOSkar).
  • Added support for Home Buttons, Highlights and Viewed Area
2018-06-25
  • Fixed Cards with Image Headers having a blank Header.
2018-02-06
  • Fixed Background being unstyled.
  • Fixed right side bar no longer being dark.
  • Added styles for code, pre and blockquote elements.
  • Fixed white shadow under buttons.
  • Fixed style used by Add List and List Headers.
2017-07-17
  • Fixed window title textarea being darker than intended.
  • Fixed checklist edit textarea being unstyled.
2017-06-28
  • Fixed Attachments being white on hover.
  • Fixed Attachments being hidden by Sticker area.
  • Fixed Cards reverting to white after Trello messed with the CSS paths.
  • Fixed Card and Card List titles reverting to grey.
  • Added partial support for card aging (will only use opacity aging for now).
2017-03-03
  • Fixed Stickers adding extra styling to the description.
2016-10-02
  • Fixed certain styles not being applied to all elements.
2016-09-16
  • Fixed Card links in card description.
2016-08-06
  • Fixed certain styles not being applied.
  • Added styling for card links.
2016-07-09
  • Remove global style override (broke things)
  • Add Style for Profile - Cards area
  • Add Style for Organization Area
  • Add Style for Businness Class Area
  • Add Style for Comments
  • Add Style for Windows
  • Add Style for Badges
  • Add Scrollbar Style for Opera, Chrome and Chromium
2016-05-20
  • Now overrides global background, color and border-color with inherit.
  • Board Menu is now correctly styled as Layer 1 and above.
  • Board Menu Activity is now styled correctly.
  • Card Labels are styled too now.
Pre-GitHub
  • Added several style for pop-overs.
  • New notifications are now correctly styled.
  • Hovered Checklist Items should no longer be bright white.
  • Textareas using incorrect text colors have been fixed.
  • Add Window-Overlay styles for a lot of elements.
  • Fixed profile styles not being applied correctly.

data.title: fix for Trello CSS change June 28 2017
Really good, only one small bug
